resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/105694</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>105694</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770202720</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Mirror, Mirror on the Ground!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Spiegel, Spiegel aus den Grund!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Miroir, miroir sur la terre !</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Espelho, espelho na terra!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Specchio, specchio sulla terra!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Καθρέφτης, καθρέφτης στο έδαφος!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¡Espejo, espejo en la tierra!</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">In this lesson, students will use their knowledge of similar triangles and indirect measurement to measure the heights of various objects.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Mathematics and Statistics</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">In dieser Lektion verwenden Kursteilnehmer ihr Wissen der 
ähnlichen Dreiecke und des indirekten Messens, um die Höhen der 
verschiedenen Nachrichten zu messen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dans cette leçon, les étudiants emploieront leur 
connaissance des triangles semblables et de la mesure indirecte pour 
mesurer les tailles de divers objets.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Nesta lição, os estudantes usarão seu conhecimento de 
triângulos similares e da medida indireta medir as alturas de vários
objetos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In questa lezione, gli allievi useranno la loro conoscenza
dei triangoli simili e della misura indiretta per misurare le altezze 
di vari oggetti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σε αυτό το μάθημα, οι σπουδαστές θα χρησιμοποιήσουν τη
γνώση τους παρόμοιων τριγώνων και έμμεσης μέτρησης για να 
μετρήσουν τα ύψη των διάφορων αντικειμένων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En esta lección, los estudiantes utilizarán su 
conocimiento de triángulos similares y de la medida indirecta para 
medir las alturas de varios objetos.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mathematik und Statistiken</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mathématiques et statistiques</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Matemática e statistics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Matematica e statistiche</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μαθηματικά και στατιστικές</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Matemáticas y estadística</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:DENISE CORBETT
FN:DENISE CORBETT
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770202720</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>105694</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/mirror-mirror-on-the-ground</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
